Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

“Worker Bees flitted from blossom to blossom, collecting nectar. We thought to steal some from the towering blossoms when we saw the swarm of vicious green Soldier Bees chase a hungry herd of goats across the meadow. Eric peeled back a flower petal, reaching for bright amber droplets. The sugary aroma forced me to smile. Suddenly he flew onto his backside. He groaned, holding a wound in his gut, coughing in a cloud of golden pollen. Hovering above him was a Worker Bee. We ran. Nectar wasn’t worth our lives.”— Telaron Prim, “RV-563E: Rustic Recollections”

“工蜂在花簇之中穿梭收集花蜜。当我们在看到一群恶毒的兵蜂正在草地上追逐一群饥饿的山羊时，我们想要从高耸的花丛中偷走一些花蜜。埃里克剥下了一片花瓣，伸手去摸发着亮光的琥珀色琼浆。涌来的芳香使我忍不住笑了起来。突然，埃里克向后飞了出去，他呻吟着捂住肚子上的伤口，在一团金黄色的花粉中剧烈咳嗽，他的上方正盘旋着一只工蜂。我们逃跑了，花蜜不值得我们付出生命。”- 特拉隆·普利姆，“RV-563E：乡村回忆”

“I discovered the origin of Growth Bee species by studying their life-draining abilities. Soldier Bees destroy enemies of the Growth. They spit corrosives, and their powerful penetrating sting absorbs enemy tissue to heal the Soldier Bee. This is because Growth Soldier Bees are constructed the same way we build a drone; the Growth uses the natural parts of native fauna. The fauna consumes a part of the Growth which hijacks that life. The life sprouts tumors. The tumors grow into adult Soldiers equipped to protect the Growth.”— Professor R. Lin’l “Bugman” Bunson, “RV-133S: Seti Alpha Outpost Recordings”

“我通过研究灵植蜜蜂吸收生命的能力，发现了这一物种的起源。兵蜂负责消灭灵植的敌人，它们能够喷吐出腐蚀性的毒液，强大而锋利的螫针能够吸收敌人的组织从而治疗自身。这是因为灵植兵蜂的结构与我们建造的无人机相同，只不过灵植使用的是原生动物群身上的部件。原生动物群吞食了灵植之后会遭到侵蚀并催生肿瘤，肿瘤将成长为成年兵蜂，为灵植提供保护。”- R.林“昆虫人”邦森教授，“RV-133S：赛提阿尔法星前哨记录”
Edit: added comma after "corrosives" Edit: constructed. The -> constructed the Edit: Tumors -> tumors

“I am green. I am the vine and the bud. I collect the riches of the earth. I drink from crystal springs. I taste golden sunshine. My vines convey me over the waters and earth. When tempests tear at me, my roots penetrate the unmoving ground and I become as unmoving as the rocks. When eaters invade to consume my tender leaves, my vines bind them until I can absorb their nutrient rich forms. I am the vine and the bud. I am green.”— Green Sprout, “RV-934D: Conversations with The Growth
“我是一株绿植，我既是藤蔓也是花蕾。我收集土壤中的养分，以晶莹的泉水和金黄的阳光为食。我的藤蔓将我运送至水源和土地之中。当狂风袭击时，我的根茎会扎进地底，变得如岩石一般稳重。当有生物以我的枝叶为食时，我的藤蔓会将它们缠绕，直到吸收它们体内丰富的养分。我既是藤蔓也是花蕾，我是一株绿植。”- 绿芽，“RV-934D：与灵植的对话”

“The Growth’s vines flailed all around me, clinging to anything they struck. The frantic strands of the great green bud curled around my arms and legs, pinning me to ground. Vine sprouts sprung from the earth. I was so entangled I couldn’t move a muscle without triggering a reaction from the constricting vines. Prodding tendrils drilled into my sides and arms, sapping my strength. It wasn’t until the company incinerated the main bud that the vines slackened and I pulled free.”— Sergeant Max Becker, “RV-4314M: Operation Yardwork”
“灵植的藤蔓在我身边摆动，附着在所有碰到的物体身上。疯狂的巨型绿色花蕾环绕在我的四肢周围，将我钉在了地上。藤蔓从地面涌出，将我紧紧缠绕，我的每一个动作都会使藤蔓收得更紧。跳动的触手钻进了我的体内和双臂，抽取着我的力量。直到我的同伴将主花蕾烧成了灰烬，藤蔓才松了下来，我才获得了自由。”- 麦克斯·贝克中尉，“RV-4314M：园艺行动”
Edit: it -> they Edit: removed last comma Edit: Sargent -> Sergeant

“Mayor Yalts warned all of us to steer clear of the field behind the junkyard. But when I took a stroll by the junkyard, instead of garbage, I smelled something sweet and delicious. I confess that I love sweets. Just beyond I discovered a maze of hut-sized flowers. The air was full of intoxicating stardust, and I knew I never wanted to leave. I never would’ve had the Mayor not arrived with a gasmask and a blowtorch. I’m told he had to forcibly remove me from a tangled mess of vines.”— Bortly Blather, “RV-808D: Sweet is The Growth”
“亚尔斯市长警告所有人远离垃圾场后面的空地。但当我路过那片垃圾场时，我发现那里不再满是垃圾，我闻到了一股香甜的味道。我承认我喜欢吃甜食。随后我看见远处有一个由屋棚般大小的花朵组成的迷宫。空气中满是令人沉醉的星屑，我知道我再也不想离开这里了。如果不是市长戴着防毒面具拿着喷灯把我从缠绕的藤蔓中强行拉了出来，我也许永远都离不开那里了。”- 伯特利·布拉瑟，“RV-808D：灵植的芬芳”
Edit: added "that" after "confess" Edit: in -> with

“I don’t trust salad, especially if it talks to me, so I steer clear of the Growth. Unlike most plants, they fill the air with allergens even after forming seeds and I hate swollen sinuses. Once, I did see a Seed Cluster attempt to spread its seeds. The thing could throw seed-pods that exploded like a grenade, and shoot seeds like a machine gun. I suppose if someone is slain by one of its seeds, a decomposing corpse is a naturally fertile place for it to grow.”— Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-4008X: Vacation Hotspots”
“我不相信沙拉，尤其是它还能与我对话的时候，所以我刻意避开灵植。与一般的植物不同，灵植即使是在生成种子之后也还会使空气充满过敏原，而我讨厌鼻窦肿胀。有一次，我看到一个种簇试图传播它的种子。它能发射出像手雷一样爆炸开来的种荚，也能像机关枪一样发射种子。我想如果有人被它的种子给杀了，那他的尸体一定会成为供养这些种子成长的天然沃土。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-4008X：假期热点”
